Person.

Person♪
Anne Greenevich ' s multimedia copy project and photographer Michael Nikitin. It's an opportunity to talk to a man about ideas that could change life, the world order and the feelings of him. All portraits of heroes are filmed, not an illustration of the text, but an independent part of history.

Person.
21-12-2023

" The earth must cry in the head, or we should eat our bread for nothing. "

If you listen to what Carelia Mihail Sinkewich's Music Theater says, you'll leave all business and buy a ticket to the opera. And when Mimi dies from the tip, Chio-Chio-san throws a dagger into his chest, Herrmann will be shot at the chart table, and Lisa will fall into the Winter Canaucus. The power of art, music and love is in the new Persona.

Person.
05-12-2023

“We prepare ourselves for the miracle.

Xenia (Kyusha) Cogan is a musical and dramatic actress of the National Theatre of Carelia. At any time, the directors can't resist and invent images for Xenia, where she could do something else, play or sing. It's like I can't do it without it! - I can!

Person.
17-11-2023

" Don't ask: What's so dark? "

Hisor Szchukarev's artist is about 40 years old. The subject of his current reflexia is the eighties. It's time, it's an artist who thinks he needs a detailed understanding. Because of the fascination of the past era and the love for two-dimensional pictures hanging on the walls, Hisr Szchukarev calls himself a retrograde. We call his work as a modern art.

Person.
25-10-2023

Life as happiness

You listen to Alexander the Queen, and you want to live, do something, study, listen and listen. She's not only able to breathe her life into her heroin, but I also believe in the best in her listeners. Even when she doesn't sing.

Person.
12-10-2023

" Reliance on evil "

Alexander Cousinkov's ancestors were the Knights of the King's Order. Even in 10 centuries, descendants have maintained high expectations of honour, debt, civil and religious missions. Alexander Cousinkov, a Knight in the 20th generation, wants to build a society in Petrozavodsk where a man would be a friend.

Person.
29-09-2023

Dream and fantasy

Alexander Mashkov calls not to confuse the plan with the dream. His plans can change instantly and his dream remains constant. Alexander dreams of a large international society that unites all living creatures in all dimensions. He thinks it's possible to bring this dream closer to a system of little things: to help someone clean up something, to calm someone down.

Person.
11-09-2023

Alexandra in cities

Alexandra Nikitina-Agalakova is a man who's not looking for easy paths. What's her own uprising on one of the mountains in Korea when she got off the comfort path and went down the mountain river! The journey itself to South Korea, a country that Alexander loves very much and whose language is studying throughout the year, is also a challenge and adventure. About what she loved in Korea and why she went there this summer, in our "songal" conversation.

Person.
11-08-2023

New time. What will it be? "

The artist and designer, Alexander Menus, has come up with the idea of making one of the most unusual museums of Petrozavodska, the Museum of recent years. Recently, life, art, dating, we are talking in the Sampo TV studio 360°. No regrets about "happily pyonic childhood."

Person.
19-07-2023

" There must be a lot of color "

The ballet and modern dancer, Leila Guchmazova, believes that audiences need to be shown not only by Giselle and the White Lake. How much? The movement of the world is well visible in modern dance art. What are we waiting for today's choreography, where the ballerina doesn't spin thirty-two feet? The taste and taste of the dance, the fly and the cottages in our conversation.

Person.
10-07-2023

“I feel that I live in the future”

Why does the carel air have a schedule, not an impressionist painting? How's the space of the carel painting? What do we not want to see in the work of great artists? Why is time so important in art? With an artist Sergei Terentiev, you can speak on any subject, it'll be interesting.

Person.
26-06-2023

"Okay, no, no, no."

Our interviewer is Nina Dashevsky's writer. She's very kind. He's not afraid to change his life, he's recognized as weak, he loves movement. After the tape, she was confidently caught up in a stranger's squat and went to a meeting with the readers at the National Library. Talking to her about life, about childhood, about this movement and about books.

Person.
22-05-2023

"I had a fortune when I saw myself upstairs."

For many years, Peter Semak was the lead actor of MDT, the Lion Dodine Theatre. Now he's in the Alexandria Theater, filming and continuing to make movies. At our request, Peter Semak is telling stories not only about himself, but also about his genius colleagues, Innocentiy Smoktonovsky, George Tovstonewe, and even Paul Scofield.

Person.
06-05-2023

“The music should not be squared”

Marius Strauvinsky, a world-name director, writes an annual performance in his chastoral tour. Says he's not a man of the world, he's a man of Carelia. In the Sampo TV studio 360°, we talk to Marius about local and global: interest in life, unlimited arts (in the example of Szelkunchik in the summer of Viet Nam), long-term residency of dyrgers, hierarchy in the orchestra.

Person.
21-04-2023

Like penguins.

In order to survive in the " unhuman " cold conditions, the penguins unite into groups and warm each other with their warmth. So, Marina Timashev thinks that people are going through difficult moments of their lives. One of the places to help survive, theatre critics, pedagogicals and journalists considers the audience.

Person.
04-04-2023

" The shoulders are my breadwinners "

In the past three years, all the heroes of the acter of Eugenia Terus. The directors won't let him shave them, the mustaches come up with different heroes and like the public. There's no chance to grow a beard, for example. In the Sampo TV studio 360°, we talk to Eugenia not only about the moustache, but also about the attitude of the actor to peace and to the profession, about the accident and the desire for happiness.

Person.
07-03-2023

Konstantin Sergeevich died

Andrei Tupikov is a director who prefers the absurd theatre to be realistic. 30 years ago, his performance, I went crazy in the TM theatre, forced the public to cry from laughter. Now he's put this stuff back in the theater, but he's with other artists. We're talking to Andrei Leonidovich about childhood, kinship, relationship with Peter Fomenko, mom's second husband, art and miracle.

Person.
17-02-2023

Look up.

Alexei Freelund is a drone pilot, a photographer, a videographer, a city architect. The ability to pilot a quadrocopter has helped him and his comrades to create a 100-metre picture of Picasso's pigeon on the ice of Lake Onez. In the Sampo TV 360° studio, we are talking to Alexei about how the ice images process took place, the tools used (spoiler: shovels) and whether this story will continue in the future.

Person.
03-02-2023

" The role of the leader will be more important than the role of the Chief "

Natalia Kozlovsky is a man who brings people and ideas together. If the world is broken, Natasha will find the strings that will legally unite people into a vital system. Her talent is based on a natural gift and a fruitful, interesting learning that includes international practice.

Person.
27-01-2023

Names on debris

The conversation with Elena Gorfunkel's theater has foreseeably gone beyond the discussion of the art of the last century. We are talking to one of the country ' s most interesting theatre critics about the current sense of time, meetings and neighbour with the great, the ethic of the viewer and the aesthetic of the Theatre Yuri Butusov.

Person.
16-12-2022

" The world was overwhelmed and I moved along with it "

Grigori Glasunov is a dancer, a choreographer, a teacher of the boot. In the interview, we asked Gregory several times to explain what the phenomenon of buto is, but the answer that explains the nature of the phenomenon has not been received. It's like, according to the master, it could be related to the feeling of its body as a single tree or a cloud in the picture of the day. A vessel which, depending on the season, may be filled with rainy water or a fall wind or fresh snow.
